I want my students to enjoy the lesson. I want them to understand that they can do it, they can succeed.
I have a TEFL certification and I am currently studying for CTEYL( teaching English to young learners ) and CTBE  ( teaching business English). In addition to this, I have a Masters’s degree in Human Physiology. I have been teaching English, Physiology, Urdu, and Biology online for 5 years and I have over 5000 hours of experience.
I can help you with:
1-English-Urdu conversational Lesson (elementary to advanced)

teacher_info.teaching_style:
My lesson plans will adapt to your English and Urdu level. My first step is to find your level and the area in which you require help. If you are a beginner we will move forward with the strategy. If you are an advanced speaker. I will ask about your passion projects. And accordingly, we will discuss a certain article or video file that I will send you beforehand. I usually make notes and corrections in the chatbox.
It would give me so much joy to be able to expand my knowledge and learning, to other people and learn from them as well. I believe each person you talk to has something to say that you could cherish and contemplate. Your insight on any subject would broaden my views.
teacher_info.cancel_policy:
Dear students! Carefully book the lesson keeping the time zone in mind. I may not be able to reschedule your lesson as I have a tight and pre-planned schedule. Although I do understand that emergencies(illness) happen, In that case, notify me as soon as possible ON SKYPE.
Informing me 2 hours before is acceptable, and It shows that you value others time. In the case of the no-show students I will wait for 20 min and if you make no attempt to contact me I will mark the lesson as complete.

pro_course_detail.title: English Conversational practice and corrections(pre-intermediate to advanced level)
pro_course_detail.description:
If you are B1-C1 level and you are wondering how to improve your spoken English then it is the perfect course for you. In this course, YOU will speak. I will elicit answers and will use different strategies(games, visual prompts, discussions) to make you talk.  I will listen to you intently and write down all the mistakes grammar and vocabulary mistakes in the chatbox. At the end of the lesson, I will offer feedback and point out some patterns that I notice in your speech. You will be introduced to modern vocabulary and phrases in every lesson. If they are difficult to comprehend I will write them down in the chatbox.  I believe positive energy is contagious so I like to be enthusiastic and energetic about what we are learning. The topics usually depend on my student’s preferences.  Some of the recurring topics in my class are things :
Day- the opener in my class is always How are you? How is your day going?
English- why are you learning English? What do you do every single day to achieve your desired English level? 
Work- what kind of work do you do? what is your favorite job up till now?
Movies/series-Which series is your favorite? Explain to me the premise of that movie? which character do you relate to the most?
Hobbies- your current passion project?
News- I usually read the newspaper of that country to discuss any important event that may have happened that day.
Animals-Do you like animals? Which animal do you like to keep as a pet?
I welcome questions as well. So you can ask me any questions and improve your listening during the process. 
 Material: if a student is interested I send some article, video essay, etc and we discuss that during the lesson
Important: please check that you have the required internet speed to have a video or audio call. To ensure that we can listen to each other properly use headphones. Don't take classes in a crowded place. Be willing to speak.  Also, if you want to reschedule do it through italki 24 before the lesson.
See you soon:)

pro_course_detail.title: Urdu conversational practice and corrections (intermediate and advance level)
pro_course_detail.description:
This course is for the intermediate level and above. Intermediate students are able to describe experiences and events, & ambitions and can give reasons and explanations for opinions and plans. Please only book this course if you are an Intermediate or advanced student. Please check that you have the required internet speed to have a video or audio call. To ensure that we can listen to each other properly, use headphones and earbuds.  ALSO, IF YOU WANT TO RESCHEDULE, DO IT THROUGH ITALKI 24 BEFORE THE LESSON.
In this course, we will discuss topics catered around your interests. We will have fun conversations as friends. I want YOU to speak. So you must have an upper elementary, intermediate, or advanced level. We will look at vocabulary, pronunciation, grammar،, and accent. I will provide source material according to your interest. My grandparents were from Lucknow so I speak very clear Urdu. I can teach colloquial and literal Urdu.
Important: please check that you have the required internet speed to have a video or audio call. To ensure that we can listen to each other properly use headphones and earbuds. Don't take classes in a crowded and noisy place. Also, if you want to reschedule do it through italki 24 before the lesson.

pro_course_detail.title: Prepared Urdu Grammar Lessons/guided conversational lessons (Beginner to elementary level)
pro_course_detail.description:
Do you find Urdu difficult to speak and understand? Through this course, you will understand Urdu pronunciations, vocabulary, and basic sentences, grammar. You will have a lot of fun because we will have a conversation from the first lesson.
Suitable for:
-beginner
-false beginner(have some exposure to the language)
-elementary
 -pre-intermediate
If you are learning Urdu 
*to talk to your Pakistani or Indian spouse
*to talk to your parents and grandma
*travel purpose
* a love for Urdu
Throughout this course, you will learn 
*guided conversation
*Urdu grammar (Tenses, postpositions, obliques, etc)
*Urdu script
*Urdu reading
*your daily routine with the help of tenses
*about your city, job, hobbies with the help of postpositions and verbs
Process:
I prepare the lesson for each student on a digital interactive whiteboard. I prepare grammar notes, dialogues, stories, substitutions, etc. After the lesson, I will provide homework(ONLY IF YOU WANT).
You are required to have:
-laptop or tablet(as the whiteboard opens only on these devices)
If you cannot have a laptop then it is fine
-C2 level in English
-basic understanding of English grammar
Remember you are expected to practice between each session so we can maintain progress. Also before booking the lesson let me know your goals and level and the grammar you want to study. If you are an absolute beginner I will start from the beginning. Also, if you want to reschedule do it through italki 24 before the lesson.
See you soon :)

pro_course_detail.title: English Listening Exercises(FCE listening  and IELTS Listening)
pro_course_detail.description:
Are you struggling to understand when people are talking to you in English? Is it becoming incomprehensible and overwhelming to understand movies and youtube videos? In this course, you will be able to hone your listening skills.
When I was a child I discovered I love listening and reading stories I listen to cassette tapes for hours. The tale of the Tarzan, jungle book, Mowgli, harry potter, lord of the rings filled me with wonder. Thus this became my life listening and reading wonderful intriguing and imaginary stories.
In this course, I will tell you those captivating and enchanting stories. They will be A1-C1, suited to your level and interest. I won't move forward until you understand the input.
I also include FCE and IELTS listening exercises. In which I will read a passage according to the test format and will ask you questions afterward to assess your comprehension level.
After the lesson, I will provide you with the story along with the notes and corrections.

1-  My first step is to find your level and the area in which you require help.

3-I will send you source material according to your level.

teacher_info.about_teacher:
Most of my previous jobs were about language expression or language teaching. 
1️⃣In terms of language expression, I graduated in broadcasting and have a Mandarin certification. I've taught host courses and undertaken host activities. So I can help you learn more professional Mandarin pronunciation. 
2️⃣In terms of teaching, I have taught oral English  for two years for college students, one year for tutoring classes for junior high school students and one year for children, etc. 
With teaching experience of various ages, I've also accumulated many teaching methods, which I will integrate into the class to help you better learn Chinese.
 I enjoy talking and tutoring foreign friends to learn
teacher_info.teaching_style:
The atmosphere of my class is pleasant and relaxed, because relaxed mentality is more conducive to language acquisition. 
There is an old Chinese saying, 因材施教"Teach students according to their aptitude". I will adopt different teaching methods for students of different levels. After class, I may also send you different review materials according to students of different levels. For example, classes for young children will include interesting flash cards and games, and review videos will be sent after class for children to read the correct sounds. Classes for adults will include cultural allusion and knowledge that will enable students to become more relevant to Chinese society.

pro_course_detail.title: General lesson: The journey begins!
pro_course_detail.description:
Do you wanna speak Chinese fluently? Do you wanna have a better spelling? Do you want to master Chinese more fully in grammar? Then you need to practice practice and practice. and I wanna help you practice more professionally and effectively, If you want fun learning lesson, just come and experience my class. 

♥if you want to learn something pratical like daily Chinese or businness Chinese,  my class is very concerntrated and only focus on useful knowledge. If you have any questions, just ask me, and I'll respond when I see it. 
What's more, frequency is important, so I will offer short free review call to help you as much as possible!

♥If you're curious about different cultures,  I wanna choose realistic cultural blending meterials for you, like food、history and eastern philosophy.  Language learning is not only about language learning, but also about getting to know the world and yourself. What do you often do in your spare time? Which kind of TV shows you like best? What kind of vocabularies you are interested in? Let's discuss together!

♥Life is a constant process of learning, I know I don't know everything, but this does not affect my enthusiasm for the world just like you learn Chinese. but remember not to get lost in memorising ‘rules’ and set structures. The more Chinese you read and listen to, and the more you practice, the more natural these structures will become. That's always the best way to learn.

the generation of characters indicates that people's thoughts, feelings, and wills can be accumulated into spiritual wealth. I'm Dinah, welcome to learn Chinese and open up a new world.

pro_course_detail.title: Advanced lesson: The deep exploration of your 'journey'
pro_course_detail.description:
For beginners, progress is rapid and feedback is clear. But when you learn linguistics to a certain extent, you reach a bottleneck, You don't know what to do except keep your sense of language
It's a choice. You can give up because of some reasons even it's really a pity
One of my students used to believe that she can only communicate in heart by native language, not by Chinese. So she gave it up for a long time.
♥But when she came to me, she was surprised to find that we had both read the same kind of tv , and she has the basic of Chinese. So we've opened a new door 
♥you can start to focus on expanding your Chinese vocabulary in your favorite areas♥

♥I have previously assisted students systematically learn Chinese history, and I guided them through reading a book every week. They said that the busier the work, the more they need to stick to their heart. They expressed their gratitude to me, and I sincerely hope that in the future you can participate in Chinese reading parties, book signings, concerts, hiking parties and so on fluently in Chinese, find your like-minded friends, and make your life happier.

But in the beginning, you may not be able to communicate about advanced topics in Chinese fluently, such as talking about your feelings about a book or a movie. That's where my class comes in——it offers an opportunity to help you make that transition. In our class, we need to communicate in Chinese, such as talking about the reading of a book, talking about the feelings of a certain film and television work, or exchanging some interesting methods.
While using your own language may allow you to communicate with someone's mind, it is when you use their language that you can truly reach their heart. I hope I can be a good friend to accompany you to see the world希望我可以成为陪你看世界的好朋友

teacher_info.intro: IELTS preparation teacher - I will teach you how to answer questions in the IELTS style with particular attention to details.
teacher_info.short_signature: I will practice your IELTS questions with you ! Contact me I will send you the questions.
teacher_info.introduction: British born Canadian ESL teacher. TESOL certification. I prepare students for the IELTS speaking test. I use the actual questions that are currently used all over the world. I can also help you with your writing of course. I also correct CVs, essays and personal statements. A typical IELTS lesson depends on where your weaknesses are. Some students want to focus on the Cue card and discussion questions and some want writing correction as well. I provide 24 hour access to my Dropbox folder which has lists  of the questions and also mp3 audio files of the answers to the questions. They are my answers and they should be able to help you make your answers longer if they are not long enough and help you learn some common expressions/idioms. Although the IELTS test is a test based on formal English, the speaking part is not. You really do receive a higher score if you can speak using these expressions occasionally.
teacher_info.about_me: IELTS preparation teacher - I will teach you how to answer questions in the IELTS style with particular attention to details.

teacher_info.teaching_style:

The questions from the Academic and the General speaking test are the same questions.
Part 1 = The interview
Part 2 = The topic question
Part 3 = The discussion questions
Books and study materials including videos all accessible from my google drive folders.
I also have videos with conversatinal English.
teacher_info.cancel_policy: I expect a 24 hour cancellation notice. If you are 15 minutes late for a lesson without notice then I will consider it cancelled and the student will pay for it..

pro_course_detail.title: IELTS Preparation Speaking
pro_course_detail.description: General and Academic! These lessons are for students that are going to be taking the IELTS exam. I will ask you IELTS questions and all of them are used in the actual exam. Your grammar and pronunciation will be corrected and I will help you with your answers of course. I will also give you study material to help you prepare. You will receives files for study and real question that have been asked recently for the IELTS test. Your essay questions will also be from the IELTS test. We are never going to prepare from made up questions like the Cambridge books do, just real questions. The questions from the real test posted online. I will only do simple corrections on the essays. I will tell you if your writing makes sense and if you will need a tutor or not. I do not teach writing.

pro_course_detail.title: Prepare for your job interview in English
pro_course_detail.description: All job interview questions. You will sent what type of job your profession is and I will ask you questions, no matter what job. The 50 most common job interview questions. This is not for school or University.  I ask you the questions and help you give better answers. If you have done any research and you are aware what questions will be asked you can supply them to me. I will send you the list in advance if you would like to prepare before the lesson. Job interviews can be very stressful, so practice is good!

pro_course_detail.title: A guide to conversation!  From pre-intermediate to advanced users.
pro_course_detail.description: 1. Most people want to talk, if you need help, I can help you. We will do the questions from the IELTS test but there will be no time constraints. You can have as much time as you want to answer and I will help you answer. 2.  If you need help with sentence structure, pronunciation or help talking about your job/life, we can do it together. To begin with we talk about life experiences  or family. If you are beyond that an if you are more comfortable with your English we can talk about anything. YOU PICK THE TOPIC, or we can go through the list of questions I have.

teacher_info.intro:
I have empowered many determined students to achieve challenging goals, such as becoming Chevening scholars, scoring band 8 in IELTS, or landing a dream job. 

With a CELTA certificate from Cambridge University and over 12 years of teaching experience, I have taught more than 12,000 language lessons.

I used to be an engineer, and I have experience in management, but my passion for languages led me to become a professional language teacher. 

I am currently studying for a diploma in English teaching (DELTA) from Cambridge University and I intend to become an IELTS in the next two years.

My long-term goal is doing a PhD in embodied cognitive science focusing on language and emotions.
teacher_info.short_signature: 100% Success Rate, +13000 Lessons, 12 Years Experience, Professional Teacher (CELTA), Engineer
teacher_info.introduction:
I am a professional English teacher with a certificate in English teaching (CELTA) from Cambridge University ESOL. I have been teaching online for six years.

I help my students improve their language skills: speaking, writing, listening and reading, with an emphasis on communication. Moreover, I teach language awareness, focusing on grammar, vocabulary and pronunciation. I also teach exam preparation classes, for example, IELTS, CAE, and FCE.

I have a passion for languages, so in addition to English, I speak French and Arabic fluently, and I'm learning German. In other words, I fully understand the challenges of learning a foreign language.

I started my career as an electrical engineer, but I also have certificates and several years of professional experience in sales, marketing, logistics and customer service, so I also teach Business and Professional English.

I occasionally teach Standard and Egyptian Arabic, and I taught French to absolute beginners several times, but I prefer teaching English.

I particularly enjoy reading philosophical fiction, but I also love learning about history, culture and art. I am also a cinephile and I occasionally write film reviews, though I rarely publish them to my blog. Moreover, I love discussing sports and lifestyles, so if you are after conversation practice, we will never run out of discussion topics and activities.

Please visit my Linkedin profile for more information about me:
https://www.linkedin.com/in/amagad
teacher_info.about_me:
I have empowered many determined students to achieve challenging goals, such as becoming Chevening scholars, scoring band 8 in IELTS, or landing a dream job. 

With a CELTA certificate from Cambridge University and over 12 years of teaching experience, I have taught more than 12,000 language lessons.

I used to be an engineer, and I have experience in management, but my passion for languages led me to become a professional language teacher. 

I am currently studying for a diploma in English teaching (DELTA) from Cambridge University and I intend to become an IELTS in the next two years.

My long-term goal is doing a PhD in embodied cognitive science focusing on language and emotions.
teacher_info.about_teacher:
I help my students improve their English by focusing on speaking skills, effective communication and language awareness.

I speak English, French and Arabic fluently, and I am learning German, so I fully understand the challenges of language learning.

I am an avid reader and a cinephile, so I love discussing books and films. I also have some creative tendencies and I am writing my first novel. As a result, I never run out of ideas for new discussion topics during lessons.
teacher_info.teaching_style:
I teach speaking skills, general English and exam preparation courses (IELTS, CPE, CAE, FCE, PET and KET). Moreover, I teach academic, business, professional and technical English based on my experience in a range of different fields.

I usually design my lessons using online resources, but I also use coursebooks published by Oxford University Press, Cambridge University Press and other ELT publishers. Additionally, I design lessons from scratch when needed.

pro_course_detail.title: Speaking Practice to Improve your English Step by Step
pro_course_detail.description:
1) Speaking Practice for Fluency:

These lessons are designed to help you improve your English verbal communication skills, i.e. the fluency and accuracy of your spoken English, in both social and professional contexts.

We will practise and discuss conversation strategies, functional language, pronunciation, accents and connected speech (stress, intonation and rhythm).

We will also focus on active listening as an essential aspect of effective communication.


2) Improve your English Step by Step:

Comprehensive and integrated lessons designed to help you improve your communication skills in English.

- Productive skills: speaking and writing (focusing on fluency and accuracy).

- Receptive skills: listening and reading (focusing on understanding gist and details).

Naturally, we will also need to improve your awareness of vocabulary, grammar and pronunciation.

pro_course_detail.title: Exam Preparation (IELTS, CPE, CAE, FCE, PET, KET, BEC, Duolingo, ILEC and Other Exams)
pro_course_detail.description:
We will discuss and practise for the speaking section during class, in addition to discussing the best strategies for improving your writing skills. I will also review and correct your writings during class upon your request.

We will focus on the different aspects of speaking and writing, such as, stress and intonation in speaking, and organisational and editing skills in writing.

I will also provide general guidance and advice concerning the reading and listening sections of the exam.

pro_course_detail.title: Business and Professional English or Job Hunting and Interview Skills
pro_course_detail.description:
Personalised lessons to match your professional needs and goals.

We can focus on business English, by discussing and practising business vocabulary, presentation skills, negotiation skills or other topics of your choice.

Alternatively, we can focus on English for special purposes, for example, English for Engineering or English for tourism.

I offer a comprehensive job hunting and interview skills course that can help you land a better job.

We can start by discussing your background, CV and career goals, then we will develop a strategy to move forward and achieve your goals.

- Practice Work: You'll have tasks to do at home that match what we've learned in class.

Don't worry, each lesson will be well organised to help you learn a lot. With different ways of teaching, I'm sure we'll make big improve

course_info.trial_description:
Welcome to my trial English lessons!

During our trial lessons, you'll get a taste of what it's like to learn English with me. We'll dive into engaging conversations where you can practice speaking English in a supportive and encouraging environment. Whether you're a beginner or more advanced, these sessions are tailored to your level and learning goals.

Here's what you can expect:
 Warm Welcome-  We'll start by getting to know each other and discussing your English learning objectives.

Interactive Learning-  Our lessons will be interactive and dynamic, with plenty of opportunities for you to speak and practice your English skills.

Personalised Feedback-  I'll provide constructive feedback to help you improve your pronunciation, grammar, and vocabulary.

Fun Activities-  We'll incorporate a variety of fun activities, such as games, quizzes, and role-plays, to keep the learning experience enjoyable and engaging.

Goal Setting-  At the end of the trial lesson, we'll discuss your progress and set clear goals for your future English learning journey.

Whether you're looking to improve your conversational English, prepare for exams, or enhance your professional communication skills, I'm here to support you every step of the way.

Book your trial lesson today and take the first step towards achieving your English language goals!

teacher_info.intro:
My name is Farah and I'm a native Arabic speaker (MSA-Iraqi-Egyptian dialects). I am a fourth year medical student and I have always been interested in learning new languages. In the process of learning these languages, I knew what works best to learn a new language and I'm delighted to share it with you in your process of learning Arabic. 
I enjoy watching movies of all genres, especially psychological thrillers, period dramas and It would be a delight to meet Harry Potter fans here! I also like listening to classical music and pop music from time to time. It would be great if we have common interests to help in your practise in learning Arabic.
teacher_info.short_signature: MSA/Egyptian/Iraqi tutor making learning Arabic fun and interactive ✨️
teacher_info.about_me:
My name is Farah and I'm a native Arabic speaker (MSA-Iraqi-Egyptian dialects). I am a fourth year medical student and I have always been interested in learning new languages. In the process of learning these languages, I knew what works best to learn a new language and I'm delighted to share it with you in your process of learning Arabic. 
I enjoy watching movies of all genres, especially psychological thrillers, period dramas and It would be a delight to meet Harry Potter fans here! I also like listening to classical music and pop music from time to time. It would be great if we have common interests to help in your practise in learning Arabic.
teacher_info.about_teacher: I think learning a new language opens a door to a new culture. That's why I believe that it's important to put effort in teaching students my language the same way I would want to be taught. I also believe that a teacher who is passionate about the subject is more likely to give you better understanding and love for the language than any other teacher.
teacher_info.teaching_style:
I teach organized lessons so every lesson will be a milestone for certain learnt words and sentences. I discuss the goal of the student first and prepare my topics, homeworks and quizzes to be finished at a certain amount of time. Practice has a huge importance and that's why we will use every minute of it for your advantage. You will notice how Arabic will be incorporated in your life after the first lesson as I make flashcards and homeworks so that you don't forget what you learn in the lesson.
The most important thing for me is to know the student's purpose of learning Arabic to prepare the lessons well according to the student's interest.

course_info.trial_description: In this trial lesson, I will discuss firstly the goal of the student and the student's level in Arabic to be our starting point.. So that I can know which set of lessons are suitable for you to reach your goal in the language. We will discuss some of the Arabic basics like the alphabet and basic conversation sentences. I expect a little homework to be done after the lesson to ensure that you understood it well! in addition I will send you flashcards so that you don't forget the material you learnt.

pro_course_detail.title: Arabic basics for complete beginners
pro_course_detail.description: This lesson is our starter for learning the first five Arabic letters in addition to easy beginner sentences. Our lessons will be on Zoom where we will work on your pronounciation and writing. You may feel that Arabic sounds are a bit difficult but gradually you will become more and more familiar with Arabic and you'll start picking up words faster.

teacher_info.intro:
My name is Athanasios. I am a native Greek speaker, but I have also lived in the US and UK for a significant amount of time. Living back and forth between Greece and English-speaking countries has shaped a bilingual mind in me. Engaging in linguistics, chasing after etymological roots, and pondering over the definitions of words, are what fascinate me. 

I have an interest in Biblical Greek and Greek Philosophy, and having good explanatory communication that is insightful for the student is what I consider a skill of mine. Also, I like to reduce the atmosphere of the class to a relaxed and easy feeling. 

Other hobbies include web designing, writing, researching, traveling, and reading.
teacher_info.about_me:
My name is Athanasios. I am a native Greek speaker, but I have also lived in the US and UK for a significant amount of time. Living back and forth between Greece and English-speaking countries has shaped a bilingual mind in me. Engaging in linguistics, chasing after etymological roots, and pondering over the definitions of words, are what fascinate me. 

I have an interest in Biblical Greek and Greek Philosophy, and having good explanatory communication that is insightful for the student is what I consider a skill of mine. Also, I like to reduce the atmosphere of the class to a relaxed and easy feeling. 

Other hobbies include web designing, writing, researching, traveling, and reading.
teacher_info.about_teacher:
As a teacher, I find myself functioning in the role daily with people. Whether to a Greek speaker on English or vice versa, I go to deep lengths to reach the true meaning of things and convey it to people. I've also been hosting Biblical Greek studies to people for about 4 years consecutively.

So I figured I would turn passion into a joy job. 

Listening to the student and meeting them at their level, is key. The teaching comes first; getting paid is secondary. If I see progress in a student, and especially if I see joy in their eyes, that's having fun for me. And I can only achieve this effect if I prioritize tailoring myself around the student.
teacher_info.teaching_style:
1. Learn the interests and needs of the student.
2. Keeping the class relaxed and the students at ease
3. Find where the student is at in their understanding of the language and begin teaching accordingly.
4. Adjust the teaching material around them, or create new ones for them - with personal additions.
5. Conversation practice will be plentiful and non-stressful. People learn when they have fun too.
6. Visual examples along with words, terms, and phrases are used to help with memorisation.
7. I use colloquial and informal words and expressions, to introduce them to what they will expect from the culture. Fitting in the culture can encourage a student a lot.

course_info.trial_description:
In our trial lesson, we can get to know each other a bit and you can share with me your preferences, your main targets, and other relevant topics on learning Greek.

I can walk you through the main areas we will be focusing on, show you some of the material and methods I use, and explain to you the overall structure or style of the lessons.

pro_course_detail.title: Learn the Greek Alphabet, Greek Accentuation & Practice Pronunciation
pro_course_detail.description:
1. Students can expect to learn the Greek alphabet through a visual and auditory process which I will present through PowerPoint and informal conversation.

2. Here, you can begin learning the proper placement of modern Greek accents and their main two purposes. 
Namely:
a. Emphasise the correct syllables
b. Changing the meaning of words

3. In addition, the accents were placed by the ancient inventors of Greek to help communicate the right meaning through proper pronunciation. 

Along with the accents, here you can learn about how to properly pronounce certain words, and certain letters, and practical techniques to help you adapt to Greek pronunciation.

- The lesson contains no tests, but I do link students with homework or with worksheets.
- The methods and materials used are face-to-face practice, visual examples, text, and worksheets.

pro_course_detail.title: Learn the Greek Pronouns & Articles
pro_course_detail.description:
Here you can learn the Greek Pronouns in context, and how they are used as subjects in sentences:

- Personal Pronouns in context
- Indefinite Pronouns in context
- Demonstrative Pronouns
- Interrogative Pronouns, and
- Relative Pronouns.

- The lesson contains no tests, but I do link students with homework or with worksheets.
- The methods and materials used are face-to-face practice, visual examples, text, and worksheets.

pro_course_detail.title: Learn & Practice Greek Conversation, and How to be Culture Wise
pro_course_detail.description:
1. Here you can practice and enhance your Greek with me in conversation. Either in the Greek you already know, or I could present you with conversation topics.

In this lesson, I will be refining your conversation level in Greek as we discuss introduction questions, topics or ideas.

2. In addition, you can also learn our culture's colloquial terms, phrases, or simple expressions, and their relative meaning according to the context they are placed in.

Learning these will immediately help you to fit into the culture, meet people at their comfort level, and boost your confidence in learning Greek.

- The lesson contains no tests, but I do link students with homework or with worksheets.
- The methods and materials used are face-to-face practice, visual examples, text, and worksheets.

teacher_info.about_teacher:
👩🏼‍🏫 I am a highly qualified, experienced, enthusiastic, adaptive and creative teacher. I am also patient and understanding, particularly when it comes to the struggles of learning a second language. My experiences with language learning give me insight into the challenges (but also rewards) you will meet in learning English.

Whether you want to prepare for the IELTS, speak more with classmates or neighbours, understand the Irish accent, or improve your academic English, I can help. The most motivating thing for me as a teacher is the pleasure of helping someone to realise their potential and their own personal goal. teacher_info.teaching_style:
I have several specialities: IELTS preparation, Academic English and writing, Irish English, British English, Business English, English for speakers of Dutch, Japanese, Portuguese, Spanish and French. 

I create fun, interactive lessons that will engage everyone, no matter your age, and put a smile on your face. If I can make you laugh it not only makes classes fun, it has also been proven to help you hold and recall new information. In my classes, the goal is for you to speak confidently. Actively speaking the language is the best way for you to get comfortable, improve vocabulary retention, and measure progress. My teaching style is therefore fun, interactive, engaging and practical.

cert_info.description: This certificate was awarded on the completion of all coursework and assessments related to teaching young people. This certificate is evidence of my proficiency in teaching English in a fun and engaging way, making the language more accessible to young learners.

This certificate was received after completing all coursework and assessments relative to the teaching of Business English. This certificate enables me to teach adults the facets of every day English used in business situations.

Before receiving this certificate an understanding was required of the challenges and opportunities posed by teaching with limited resources. This certificate is evidence of my ability to meet these challenges and benefit from the opportunities.

The basic requirement for this certificate was attendance at an intensive teacher training course. As well as this, it was necessary to complete the required in-class tasks and assessments. Crucial to acquiring this certificate was the design and implementation of a lesson plan with a class of 5 or more students, aimed at teaching a particular grammar point. I received excellent marks and feedback on all activities but particularly my lesson planning.

Requirements for this certificate included completion of all tasks and assessments. The content covered in this course equipped me with a knowledge of TEFL/TESOL theory and practice and enables me to competently teach students of English, from course design to lesson planning, through to assessment.

This certificate was awarded after completion of all course requirements, including coursework and assessments. This course equips me to teach larger classes, managing many people, younger and older, and holding the attention of all students, regardless of differing abilities in understanding and speaking English.

This certificate was awarded after completing coursework and assessments aimed at increasing understanding of English grammar structures. This enables me to teach grammar in a way that makes the structure of English understandable and digestible for non-native speakers.

course_info.trial_description:
Take a trial lesson with me and discover what we can do together! I welcome your input on what your goals, target areas, weaknesses and strengths are, when it comes to learning English. I can provide feedback, a structured curriculum, homework, tests and quizzes...whatever you need to reach your English goals. Together we can identify the right type of lessons and lesson structure that will work for you, and soon you'll be winging your way to English success! :) 

This trial lesson can be a simple exercise in getting familiar with each other, or it can be a structured mini-class. Whatever you prefer! If you have a specific goal, test, business requirement etc., please let me know before the class. I can tailor my classes to your needs and learning style. I'm so looking forward to helping you on your English language journey!

pro_course_detail.title: KID'S CONVERSATIONAL ENGLISH
pro_course_detail.description: These classes are aimed at children from ages 5-50. Yes, parents are welcome (even preferred) to attend the class along with the student, particularly younger students. In this class we will cover conversational topics ranging from our favourite foods or animals, to what we did that day, to our hobbies and aspirations for the future. If your child has a particular interest (e.g. space exploration, fashion, dancing, nature and animals) we can focus on these areas. The class will focus on correcting and improving conversational english, including pronunciation, grammar, and vocabulary (and writing where needed). For younger students, we will play games and other fun activities. For those with a more advanced level of English, we can use these conversations to identify and target areas for improvement, and potentially choose other types of lessons which might benefit the student. I can tailor the classes to your needs and interests, and for those extra enthusiastic students, I offer homework and lesson plans! :)

pro_course_detail.title: ACADEMIC ENGLISH/EDITING
pro_course_detail.description: Have you found yourself with more time to improve your secondary research skills? Have you always wanted to improve your spoken or written English for use in presentations and publications. With over 10 years of experience in academia, including writing, correcting and editing publications, I can help you sharpen your English skills for your next peer-reviewed paper or conference presentation. This lesson will focus on spoken English, but we will use this to identify topics, expressions or sentence structures which have been causing you problems. As well as feedback on your English, I provide examples, exercises and even a structured plan should you require one. I can also read some of your previous work in order to identify challenges and strengths in your writing style. Together we can quickly hone your academic English skills!

pro_course_detail.title: ENGLISH GRAMMAR
pro_course_detail.description: This lesson is for all ages (>10 years old) and focuses specifically on the bones of the English language, the structure on which all the vocabulary hangs - English grammar! In this lesson we will cover specific grammar points, how they are used, and how to use them as building blocks in the construction of your English. Because these building blocks are broken down into compact, digestible parts, it is possible to build a tailor-made curriculum to suit your needs and goals, as well as to take only one lesson at a time and propose a grammar point that has been causing you particular difficulty. In this sense, we can tighten or broaden the scope to suit you. I provide examples, homework and a structured syllabus if required.

pro_course_detail.title: CONVERSATIONAL ENGLISH
pro_course_detail.description: This class is for all ages and all levels of English proficiency, as the aim is simply free talking as you would in an everyday conversation. It is particularly useful for practicing the kinds of everyday conversations you might be finding challenging right now (about the news or current events; about what you did at the weekend or on your holiday). To tailor the conversation to your needs, you can choose the topic/s, and I will provide the feedback on your English directly during the class. If you prefer to cover a wide variety of different topics (this is advisable at the intermediate level, in order to expand your vocabulary), I can provide a diverse range of different topics as well as discussion formats. At the end of the class we will identify some grammar, vocabulary or pronunciation points to work on. If you send me the topic in advance I will send some useful grammar structures, vocabulary and expressions for you to practice in advance or follow up on during the class.

pro_course_detail.title: TEST PREPARATION
pro_course_detail.description: This lesson is targeted specifically to your needs. Together we will create a curriculum and a timeline for learning, focusing on strengthening your strong points and addressing your weak points. Let me know what your test date is and we can custom make a lesson plan, including extra exercises and resources for practicing outside of class time. This lesson is not limited to state organised exams, we can also prepare for your school or university exam, no matter what your level or age.

pro_course_detail.title: BUSINESS ENGLISH
pro_course_detail.description: Whether you work in English every day and have identified areas of your English that you need to improve, or you have occasional interactions with English-speaking business associates and want to feel more comfortable in those interactions, this lesson is the perfect lesson for you. The class is designed to identify your sticking points in English and to help you target these areas, but also to identify your strengths, expand your vocabulary and improve your confidence. You will practice speaking English proficiently, but also assertively, focusing on particular language that helps you communicate more effectively in a business setting.

"Easy Japanese" is a program of Japanese language lessons produced by Japan's public broadcaster, NHK WORLD RADIO JAPAN. You can learn basic grammar and useful expressions through lessons designed in audio-drama style. You can download audio and texts for the lessons free of charge.

Introduction of the story
The heroine of the story is Anna, a 20-year-old Thai student who loves Japanese manga. She has come to Japan to learn the Japanese language for one year at a university in Tokyo. She will learn practical Japanese through various experiences, such as classes at the university, daily life at a dormitory, shopping, and traveling.
Japanese Lesson only for N5~N4 level

teacher_info.intro:
I am a Native  English speaker with a Level 5 TEFL certificate and I am an Online English teacher teaching Business English,  IELTS and General English. I am a Freelance Accountant with a bachelors degree in Accounting and in my spare time I enjoy reading, playing sports and watching Netflix
I am a bit of an introvert however I do enjoy meeting new people and learning more about their cultural backgrounds. English is such a complicated and diverse language that takes time to learn and master and I enjoy going on the journey of learning with my students

teacher_info.about_teacher: As a teacher, I'm very enthusiastic and passionate about the lessons I teach and the students I engage with. I love to elicit answers from my students and encourage them to make mistakes because that is the best way that they will learn the English language. I understand the complexities that come with learning the English Language and I am very patient with my students on their journey to discovery.
teacher_info.teaching_style: My lessons and Teaching style is structured, organised and involves extensive speaking. My students will be required to speak at least 1000 words each lesson and possibly more depending on the duration of the lesson.  Students will know exactly what is expected of them before each lesson.
